channel.title: How strict is Jagex on these things
channel.description:
Alright, I am wondering how strict and how high risk of a ban is for these things:
1. Account Sharing - I had account shared for around 4 months. I was muted because my friend was being a retard, but is it very strict and easy for Jagex to find out? Nothing bad happened in the 4 months.
2. RSBot - How detectable is it? I have heard people being banned from it.

item.title: How strict is Jagex on these things
item.dc:creator: @haticks haticks
item.description:
@haticks wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:25, topic:263190”][quote author=haticks link=topic=347636.msg2685022#msg2685022 date=1235610337]

I think I met you on runescape 5 years ago Hat…

Edit: I’m being serious. Do you remember me? I asked you about runecrafting, and you told be about tip.it You were level 71 at the time if it helps, and it was north of fally, to the mind altar.
[/quote]Somebody has a good memory.

Nigga left an impression.

so what he do dawg?

pregentwoman

what? you still mad cause you lost the argument?[/quote]Idiot. That was the accounts name…

Edit: When i said pregentwoman i miss quoted and quoted the wrong question. I meant to anwer “what was the deaf kids name on runescape”

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:19, topic:263190”][quote author=phonnygoblin link=topic=347636.msg2683810#msg2683810 date=1235532234]
I think I met you on runescape 5 years ago Hat…

Edit: I’m being serious. Do you remember me? I asked you about runecrafting, and you told be about tip.it You were level 71 at the time if it helps, and it was north of fally, to the mind altar.
[/quote]Somebody has a good memory.[/quote]Eh. What was your accounts name?

Read full topic
item.source: How strict is Jagex on these things

item.title: How strict is Jagex on these things
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

haticks:

I shared accounts with a deaf kid, and his friend. They both live about 3000 miles away, and we shared it for about a year. And during this whole time we were phishing. Never got banned. The member ship was bought from like 3 different cc’s throughout the year. I don’t think they really care if your a member tbh.

What was the deaf kid’s name on runescape?

Read full topic
item.source: How strict is Jagex on these things

casey.:

your an idiot, you shouldn’t bot.

item.title: How strict is Jagex on these things
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

Cain_:

I share my accounts with an american i don’t know (well, only one of the accounts was originally mine), and none of the accounts have been banned for account sharing (i live in NZ)

Strange… I’ve logged in accounts to have them instantly locked, and heard similar stories.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I know like 50 people who’ve been banned for alching in the house.

French PC Bank is best spot, no randoms, hardly any people

Read full topic

item.title: How strict is Jagex on these things
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I had shared accounts on my 117 for a few months, and all that happened was a temporary mute because he was an idiot…but I guess I will bot for awhile and take a few days break time. I just botted about 1M worth normal essence on my f2p pure, and now I am breaking for 3 days.

Read full topic

item.title: How strict is Jagex on these things
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:9, topic:263190”]Well I have had it running and it takes about 5 minute breaks. It has worked perfectly so far, but it doesn’t do anything when it has a break. I am a little nervous to bot on my 117, so I don’t know how often I should take breaks.

If I am going to use an auto-alcher, how often should I stop the bot?[/quote]

It reallyt is how often do you think should you stop it? What I do when autoing on my main is put the bot on and sit at the computer say reading or doing something else but watch it every now and again…

Read full topic
item.source: How strict is Jagex on these things

item.title: How strict is Jagex on these things
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Well I have had it running and it takes about 5 minute breaks. It has worked perfectly so far, but it doesn’t do anything when it has a break. I am a little nervous to bot on my 117, so I don’t know how often I should take breaks.

If I am going to use an auto-alcher, how often should I stop the bot?

Read full topic
item.source: How strict is Jagex on these things

item.title: How strict is Jagex on these things
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:7, topic:263190”]So lets say I use a woodcutting script on a level 117. If I run it for a day or two, and then don’t use any scripts for 2 days, will I get caught?

I am currently botting on a noob account, and planning on botting for about 8 hours or more today. Should I take breaks, or can I let it run the straight 8 hours? I am using the f2p script “MrPanda’s Ess Miner”, and I have noticed it takes breaks by itself. Does this help?[/quote]

If you go on for 8 hours a day and it takes random breaks that’ll be ok but if you suddenly stop you might have a problem…

Read full topic
item.source: How strict is Jagex on these things

item.title: How strict is Jagex on these things
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

So lets say I use a woodcutting script on a level 117. If I run it for a day or two, and then don’t use any scripts for 2 days, will I get caught?

I am currently botting on a noob account, and planning on botting for about 8 hours or more today. Should I take breaks, or can I let it run the straight 8 hours? I am using the f2p script “MrPanda’s Ess Miner”, and I have noticed it takes breaks by itself. Does this help?

Read full topic
item.source: How strict is Jagex on these things

item.title: How strict is Jagex on these things
item.dc:creator: @Greg_the_Xeno Greg the Xeno
item.description:
@Greg_the_Xeno wrote:

Chassy13:

2. RSBot - How detectable is it? I have heard people being banned from it.

You need to be a smart botter, don’t bot for more then a week at a time, take 3 day breaks ect. i’ve never been banned for using rsbot.

Read full topic
item.source: How strict is Jagex on these things

item.title: How strict is Jagex on these things
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:4, topic:263190”]lol i’ve had people from china on my account for like 40 days and no ban.[/quote]Lmao ^^

I use RSBot quite a lot. It all depends on the script you use, really. Make it seem realistic enough and you’re good (so basically, dont use the ones that come with it and make your own).

Read full topic

item.title: How strict is Jagex on these things
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

i think the risk of ban from account sharing depends on how far away you live from each other. you risk getting it locked if you log in from australia, and then from the us 5 minutes later

rsbot is detectable on login

Read full topic
item.source: How strict is Jagex on these things
